hero.name: Artem Stakhov
hero.greeting: Hi! I'm Artem Stakhov â€” a Software Engineer with Bachelor's and Master's degrees in Software Engineering. I'm passionate about web development, automation, and artificial intelligence.

roadmap.title: School
roadmap.description: Attended school in Nyzhniy Teplyi, Luhansk region. Gained foundational knowledge in mathematics and natural sciences.

roadmap.title: College
roadmap.description: Studied at the College of Engineering and Technology in Severodonetsk, affiliated with V. Dal University. Learned discrete mathematics, Pascal programming, mathematical analysis, and more. Built a strong foundation in programming.

roadmap.title: Bachelor's Degree
roadmap.description: Earned a Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering from Uzhhorod National University. Overall grade: 75%, Diploma defended with distinction (90-100%).

roadmap.title: Master's Degree
roadmap.description: Pursuing a Master's degree in Software Engineering at Uzhhorod National University. Expected grade: around 85%, Diploma to be defended with distinction (90-100%).

roadmap.title: Freelance Start
roadmap.description: Started working as a freelance front-end developer. Created landing pages using HTML, JavaScript, and Sass. Project example: https://github.com/artemstakhov/hadar_front

roadmap.title: CityUnscripted
roadmap.description: Worked as a Front-end Developer at CityUnscripted (Ukraine-UK). Used React, Redux, JavaScript, and jQuery. Became the lead React developer, managed design, developed a React Native app, and wrote Cypress tests.

roadmap.title: InkoMenu Freelance
roadmap.description: Served as Tech Lead at InkoMenu (Ukraine). Developed an admin panel and client site using React and Redux. Worked on translations, themes, and custom components.

roadmap.title: Relocation to Lithuania
roadmap.description: Moved to Lithuania in September 2026, now living in Jonava, Kaunas district. Started learning n8n and automation. Built a media farm using AI in Telegram and developed a video generation system with transcription.

experience.description: Designed and developed features and pages from scratch or based on provided designs. Used React, Redux, JavaScript, and jQuery. Implemented modals, animations, and responsive design. Managed design, developed a React Native app, and wrote Cypress tests.

Designed and developed an admin panel and client site based on Figma designs. Used React, Redux, and JavaScript. Implemented translations, themes, custom components, and animations. Reviewed backend code.

Created a landing page with an additional page from scratch. Used pure JavaScript, HTML, and Sass. Implemented modals, scroll animations, and responsive design. Project example: https://github.com/artemstakhov/hadar_front

certificates.name: Successful Startup: From Idea to Scaling
